app_name.message: TabTabTab - All In One Tab Manager
app_name.description: The name of the application. Shown in the web store.

app_name_short.description: The short name of the application. Shown at the top of the dropdown menu.

app_desc.message: Supports your browsing by improving tab management.
app_desc.description: The short description of the application. Shown in the web store.

window.description: Used as a heading for window tabs in the popup. For example, it is used as 'Window1', 'Window2', etc.

current_window.description: Used as a heading within the popup to indicate the current window in the window tabs section.

add_window.description: Text used to display the action for adding a window

save_window.description: Text used to display the action for save a window

save_all_windows.description: Text used to display the action for save all windows

merge_right_window.description: Text used to display the action for merge a right window

merge_left_window.description: Text used to display the action for merge a left window

close_window.description: Text used to display the action for closing a window

no_stored_window_header.description: Used to show when stored window is empty.

no_stored_window_description.message: Once you save a window from the list, you can restore it here.
no_stored_window_description.description: Used to show when stored window is empty.

save_current_window.description: Text used to display the action for save the current window

new_tab_title_form_placeholder_to_stored.description: Text used to display the action for save a new tab to stored window/group

new_tab_form_site_fetch_error.message: Failed to fetch. Please enter manually.
new_tab_form_site_fetch_error.description: Displayed when site title and favicon cannot be fetched automatically.

pinned.description: Used as a heading for grouping and displaying pinned tabs together.

tab_group.description: Used as a heading for Tab Group.

no_stored_tab_group_header.description: Used to show when stored tab group is empty.

no_stored_tab_group_description.message: Once you save a group from the list, you can restore it here.
no_stored_tab_group_description.description: Used to show when stored tab group is empty.

month.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '1 month ago'.

months.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 months ago'.

week.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '1 week ago'.

weeks.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 weeks ago'.

day.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '1 day ago'.

days.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 days ago'.

hour.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '1 hour ago'.

hours.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 hours ago'.

min.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '1 min ago'.

mins.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 mins ago'.

sec.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '1 sec ago'.

secs.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 secs ago'.

ago.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 mins ago'.

search_tabs.description: Displayed as a placeholder in the tab search form.

no_results_found.description: Displayed when no results are found during a tab search.

group_tabs_search_result_tabs.description: Displayed as a button for the search results in the tab group.

group_tabs_search_result_tabs_descriptio.message: Group search result tabs by keyword. Adds to an existing group or creates a new one, excluding pinned tabs.
group_tabs_search_result_tabs_descriptio.description: Displayed as a description for the button to group tabs in the search results.

recent_active_tabs_header.description: Recently active tab headings to display in search results

open_side_panel.description: Action text to open the side panel.

close_side_panel.description: Action text to close the side panel.

open_dashboard.description: Action text to open the dashboard.

rate_and_review.description: Action text to open the store review page.

join_discussions.description: Action text to open GitHub Discussions page.

sponsor_project.description: Action text to open Sponsor page.

copy_url.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

duplicate_tab.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

add_new_tab_next.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

add_new_tab_in_group.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

add_new_tab_in_window.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

pin.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

unpin.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

add_to_new_group.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

remove_from_group.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

screenshot_visible_area.description: Displayed within the action menu for highlighted tab.

save_tab_group.description: Displayed within the action menu for tab group.

ungroup.description: Displayed within the action menu for tab group.

close_group.description: Displayed within the action menu for tab group.

unpin_all.description: Displayed within the action menu for pinned.

close_all.description: Displayed within the action menu for pinned.

duplicated.description: Displayed next to the tab title if the same tab exists across the entire window.

resolve_duplicates.description: Text displayed on hover over the duplicate chip next to the tab, an action to resolve duplicate tabs.

cleanup_tabs_header.description: Heading for the Cleanup Tabs feature.

tab_cleaner_header.description: Heading for the feature that automatically close tabs that have not been used for a set period of time.

tab_cleaner_description.message: By enabling this setting, tabs will automatically close once the set duration has passed since they were last active.
tab_cleaner_description.description: Description for the feature that automatically closes tabs that have not been used for a specified period of time.

duration.description: Heading for the input form to set the duration for automatically closing tabs that have been inactive for a specified period.

unit.description: Heading for the unit input form used in the feature for automatically closing tabs after a specified period of inactivity.

duration_unit_day.description: One of the selectable units for the duration in the feature that automatically closes tabs after a specified period of inactivity.

duration_unit_hour.description: One of the selectable units for the duration in the feature that automatically closes tabs after a specified period of inactivity.

options_navigation_all_windows.description: Navigation header for AllWindows Page in options.html

options_navigation_save_and_restore.description: Navigation header for Save & Restore page in options.html

options_navigation_tidy_tabs.description: Navigation header for TidyTabs page in options.html

options_navigation_settings.description: Navigation header for Settings page in options.html

options_navigation_feedback.description: Navigation header for Feedback page in options.html

options_navigation_sponsor.description: Navigation header for Sponsor page in options.html

tab_grouping_header.description: The main header for the tab grouping section.

tab_grouping_group_tabs_now.description: Button text to trigger immediate tab grouping.

tab_grouping_group_tabs_automatically.description: Switch label for enabling/disabling automatic tab grouping.

tab_grouping_detail_settings_subheader.description: Subheader for detailed tab grouping settings.

tab_grouping_auto_collapse_unused_tab_gr.description: Option to automatically collapse tab groups that are not in use.

tab_grouping_auto_ungroup_single_tab_gro.description: Option to automatically ungroup tab groups that contain only one tab.

tab_grouping_apply_auto_grouping_to_curr.message: Apply Auto-Grouping to Current Tab Only
tab_grouping_apply_auto_grouping_to_curr.description: Option to apply automatic tab grouping only to the currently active tab.

tab_grouping_apply_auto_grouping_to_curr.message: When on, newly opened tabs from the current one, such as links or bookmarks, won't be auto-grouped.
tab_grouping_apply_auto_grouping_to_curr.description: Details how enabling this option will exclude tabs opened from the current one from automatic grouping.

tab_grouping_group_tabs_by.description: Label for selecting the criterion for tab grouping.

tab_grouping_group_tabs_by_menu_item_dom.description: Option to group tabs by domain.

tab_grouping_group_tabs_by_menu_item_sub.description: Option to group tabs by subdomain.

theme_color_setting_header.description: The main header for the theme color setting section.

popup_setting_header.description: The main header for the popup setting section.

popup_size_header.description: Heading for the popup size settings.

popup_size_description.description: Notes or cautionary advice regarding the settings for the popup size.

toolbar_setting_header.description: The main header for the toolbar setting section.

toolbar_icon_click_behavior_setting_head.message: Select which view to open when the toolbar icon is clicked.
toolbar_icon_click_behavior_setting_head.description: Heading for the toolbar icon click behavior settings.

toolbar_icon_click_behavior_select_popup.description: Option to open the popup when the toolbar icon is clicked.

toolbar_icon_click_behavior_select_side_.description: Option to open the side panel when the toolbar icon is clicked.

toolbar_icon_click_behavior_select_dashb.description: Option to open the dashboard when the toolbar icon is clicked.

scale.description: Heading for the input form to adjust the scale of elements within the popup.

height.description: Heading for the height input form in the popup size settings.

width.description: Heading for the width input form in the popup size settings.

save.description: Text for the save button in the settings form.

saving.description: Text displayed on the save button in the settings form when saving is in progress.

saved_successfully.description: Message displayed in a toast notification when settings are successfully saved in the settings form.

saved_error.message: Failed to save the setting. Please try again.
saved_error.description: Message displayed in a toast notification when settings fail to save in the settings form.

popup_size_validation_error_value_format.description: Error message displayed for validation issues in the popup size settings.

popup_size_validation_error_value_range.message: The height should be set to a value between 200 and 600, and the width should be set to a value between 400 and 800.
popup_size_validation_error_value_range.description: Error message displayed for validation issues in the popup size settings.

tab_cleaner_validation_error_value_forma.description: Error message displayed for validation issues in the feature that automatically closes tabs after a specified period of inactivity.

bug_report_and_feature_request_title.description: Heading for the section covering bug reports and feature requests.

bug_report_and_feature_request_descripti.message: If you encounter any bugs while using TabTabTab, or have suggestions for feature requests, please feel free to create an issue on GitHub.
bug_report_and_feature_request_descripti.description: Description for the section dedicated to submitting bug reports and feature requests.

store_review_title.description: Heading for the store reviews section.

store_review_description.message: If you find TabTabTab helpful, we would greatly appreciate it if you could leave us a review on the ChromeWebStore! Your voice greatly contributes to the development of TabTabTab.
store_review_description.description: Description for the section regarding store reviews.

source_code_title.description: Heading for the source code section.

source_code_description.message: The code for TabTabTab is open source and publicly available. It is carefully managed to prevent any illicit programming, ensuring the extension is developed safely.
source_code_description.description: Description for the section related to the source code.

sponsor_page_description.message: TabTabTab is an open-source project, mainly developed by an individual. If you find it useful, I'd be grateful if you could consider supporting this project.

add_tab.description: Action to add a new tab.

edit_title.description: Action to edit the title of an item.

open.description: Action to open the selected item.

remove.description: Action to remove the selected item.

to_select.description: Instruction for selecting an item in the search dialog footer.

to_navigate.description: Instruction for navigating between items in the search dialog footer.

to_close.description: Instruction for closing the search dialog in the footer.
